roleset.name: not malignant, dangerous to health
roleset.note: BENIGN-J NOTES: Added by Julia based on BOLT-7. (from benign.01-j)

role.descr: cancer or other disease not found (if in addition to arg1)

example.name: arg1
example.text: Although her father 's tumour is benign , it still costs a lot of money .

example.name: args 1, 3
example.text: Ive heard that hemangiosarcoma is benign for cats

example.name: args 1, 2
example.text: Just got wonderful news today that Bern's lymph node biopsy that was sent to Mayo Clinic is benign for cancer.
example.arg: Bern's lymph node biopsy that was sent to Mayo Clinic
